description: Creates or updates the auth policy.

ResourceIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 21  
Maximum Length: 200  
Pattern: ^((((sn)|(svc))-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn(:[a-z0-9]+([.-][a-z0-9]+)*){2}(:([a-z0-9]+([.-][a-z0-9]+)*)?){2}:((servicenetwork/sn)|(service/svc))-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: Replacement

Policy.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption

State.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | INACTIVE  
Update requires: No interruption
